cons: Avoid During Pregnancy And Breast Feeding.
If suffering from hypersensitivity should avoid eating avocado
description: They contain soluble and insoluble fibers that help to keep the digestive system running smoothly.
Consumption of avocados also helps in preventing bad breath, which is primarily caused due to indigestion or an upset stomach.
It plays a very important role to maintaining the balance of minerals and fluids in those who suffer from chronic kidney disorders.
Avocado contains both vitamin C and E, which help enhance antioxidant properties of the human body. Vitamin C recycles vitamin E and helps reduce the oxidation of LDL cholesterol.
Health benefits of avocados include lower risk of cancers, including breast cancer and prostate cancer.
name: Avocado
pros: They contain soluble and insoluble fibers that help to keep the digestive system running smoothly.
Consumption of avocados also helps in preventing bad breath, which is primarily caused due to indigestion or an upset stomach.
It plays a very important role to maintaining the balance of minerals and fluids in those who suffer from chronic kidney disorders.
Avocado contains both vitamin C and E, which help enhance antioxidant properties of the human body. Vitamin C recycles vitamin E and helps reduce the oxidation of LDL cholesterol.
Health benefits of avocados include lower risk of cancers, including breast cancer and prostate cancer.

Avocados, like olives, are high in mono-unsaturated fats and calories. Help lower LDL or bad cholesterol and increase HDL or good cholesterol, and thereby, help prevent coronary artery disease as well as stroke risk through favouring healthy blood lipid profile.
They are also good in many health-benefiting vitamins. Vitamins A, E, and K primarily concentrated in its creamy pulp
